'''''Other Minds'' 25''' is the twenty-fifth issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in December 2021.

==Contents==
* "Editorial: News from Middle-earth"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Inside Information"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "A Chief's Challenge - Ravens in the North Adventure #2"
** By Andreas Erdmann
* "The Making of FanlonMapFond"
** By Christian
* "The Hagavorl and the Borderers of Eredoriath ca. T.A. 861 - 1411"
** By David Feeney
* "Ringlann and north-western Palisor in the First Age"
** By Gabriele Quaglia
* "A TOR Guide to the Blue Mountains"
** By Andrew Laubacher
* "The Dwarf-city of Hargrod - Jewel of the Blue Mountains"
** By Andrew Laubacher
